From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::DrillBit::

He rolls out of the way of the two laser blasts. He then sees Cygnar and
others pulling out.
"What the hell!" He screams. He opens his comm to them.
"Get back here! Those cannons are nothing to worry about. Concentrait
your fire on them, and destroy them first. Then move on."
He locks on to one of the four cannons and opens fire. It would not take
long for his gattaling gun to take it out.
